lead_paragraph: During his time as the quarterback in San Francisco, Jeff Garcia set about writing his name into the record books of the 49ers, a team that has featured Y. A. Tittle, John Brodie, Joe Montana and Steve Young. In 2000, Garcia set team records for completions (355) and passing yards (4,278) in a season, and his 32 touchdown passes in 2001 were the third most in team history.
